tables.query:
id STRING,
                    name STRING,

                    token STRING,

                    PRIMARY KEY (id)

                    syncedOnline BOOL,

                    PRIMARY KEY (id)

                    PRIMARY KEY (id)

                isSetting BOOL,

                    updatedAt DATETIME,
                    PRIMARY KEY (id)

                    updatedAt DATETIME,
                    PRIMARY KEY (id)

id STRING,

id STRING NOT NULL,

id STRING,

                    stockId STRING,

                    quantity int(11) NOT NULL,

                    channel STRING,

                    updatedAt DATETIME,
                    PRIMARY KEY (id)

id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
                    branchId int(11) NOT NULL,
                    name int(11) NOT NULL,
                    token STRING NOT NULL,
                    channel STRING,
                    createdAt DATETIME,
                    updatedAt DATETIME,
                    PRIMARY KEY (id)

id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
                    branchId int(11) NOT NULL,
                    businessName int(11) NOT NULL,
                    digitalLogo STRING  NULL,

                    showItemNote BOOL  NULL,
                    channel STRING,
                    createdAt DATETIME,
                    updatedAt DATETIME,
                    PRIMARY KEY (id)
